summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Light/Dark Mode theme toggle for Survey360 application. All features working correctly - theme toggle button toggles between light and dark modes, all pages render correctly in both themes, and Settings page Theme tab shows Light/Dark/System options.
passed_tests: Theme toggle button in header toggles between light and dark mode
Dashboard page renders correctly in light mode - bg: rgb(249, 250, 251), text: rgb(17, 24, 39)
Dashboard page renders correctly in dark mode - bg: rgb(10, 22, 40), text: white
Surveys page renders correctly in both light and dark modes
Settings page Theme tab shows Light/Dark/System theme options
Clicking theme options in Settings correctly changes theme
Responses page renders correctly in both light and dark modes
Billing page renders correctly in both light and dark modes
Theme persists when navigating between pages
Theme toggle icon changes based on current theme (Sun for dark, Moon for light)
Cards, inputs, and borders adapt to theme correctly
Text contrast is proper in both modes (dark text on light bg, light text on dark bg)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Theme toggle feature is fully functional. The isDark pattern is used across all Survey360 pages (Dashboard, Surveys, Responses, Billing, Settings) to conditionally apply theme-aware classes. Theme state is stored in useUIStore and persists across page navigation.
